posts.postText:
So I come online for the 1st time in a while and I look at the mining part of my house and I notice this...

http://imgur.com/Yqydd

(Notice how the cobblestone runs right into a dirt spike that wasn't there before)
What I think happened is that part of the world got... remade or something. A similar thing happened a while ago when a monster spawner appeared appeared where I was going to build a small cottage. It's no big deal or anything now but... if the middle of my house or my cat gets erased and replaced with random landscaping... yeahhhhh. 

P.S. +5 Awesome points if you noticed the zombie in the tree.
